title: RIT + TabletPC + OneNote = Yay!
body: <p>I wish I had a <a href="http://www.microsoft.com/windowsxp/tabletpc/" title="tablets are sweeeeet">TabletPC</a> and <a href="http://www.microsoft.com/office/onenote/prodinfo/" title="onenote is cool too, especially with a tablet">OneNote</a> when I went to <a href="http://www.rit.edu/" title="rit sux">RIT</a>.  <a title="Ern" href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog">Ern</a> sent me this <a href="http://www.microsoft.com/resources/casestudies/CaseStudy.asp?CaseStudyID=15482" title="RIT Delivers Notes to Students Who Are Deaf, Better and Faster, at Lower Cost">MS Case Study</a> yesterday.  When I took Tech. Transfer at RIT, one of our group assignments was to come up with a new innovation â€” only two of the innovations <em>didn't</em> involve taking notes in class.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-19
